description: The BR-01 RTO serves the Patna district, the capital city of Bihar. As the primary transport office for the state capital, it manages a high volume of vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and permits for both private and commercial transport. It is one of the most critical and busiest transport offices in the state of Bihar.
address: DTO Office Patna, Bank Road, West Gandhi Maidan, Raja Ji Salai, Chajju Bagh, Patna, Bihar

description: The BR-02 RTO serves the Gaya district in Bihar, acting as the primary hub for vehicle registration and transport administration in the Magadh region. It oversees the licensing and regulatory compliance for one of India's most significant religious and historical cities.
address: Collectorate Building, Collectorate Circle, Durga Bari, Gaya, Bihar

description: The BR-03 RTO serves the Bhojpur district in Bihar, with its administrative headquarters in Arrah. It is responsible for vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and the enforcement of transport regulations across the district.
address: Collectoriate Building, Arrah, Bhojpur, Bihar

description: The BR-04 RTO serves the Saran district with its headquarters located in Chapra, Bihar. It is a key administrative hub for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and transport tax collection within the Saran division.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Chapra, Saran, Bihar

description: The BR-05 RTO serves the East Champaran district, headquartered in the historic city of Motihari. This office manages all transport-related activities including vehicle registration, permit issuance, and licensing for the district bordering Nepal.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Motihari, East Champaran, Bihar

description: BR-06 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Muzaffarpur, a key administrative and commercial center in North Bihar. The office is responsible for vehicle registration, road tax collection, and the issuance of driving licenses for the entire Muzaffarpur district under the Tirhut division.
address: Collectoriate Building, Muzaffarpur, Bihar

description: BR-07 is the official District Transport Office for Darbhanga, Bihar, which manages vehicle registration, commercial permits, and driving licenses for one of the oldest cities in North Bihar. It serves as a critical transport administrative hub for the Darbhanga Division, ensuring compliance with state transport laws.
address: District Transport Office, Laheriasarai, Darbhanga, Bihar

description: The BR-08 RTO serves the Munger district in Bihar, historically known as Monghyr. It is an active District Transport Office (DTO) responsible for vehicle registrations, issuing driving licenses, and enforcing motor vehicle regulations within the Munger region.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Munger, Bihar

description: The District Transport Office (DTO) in Begusarai is the administrative body responsible for vehicle registration and licensing in the Begusarai district under code BR-09. It plays a vital role in regulating transport for this industrial hub, often referred to as the Industrial Capital of Bihar.
address: District Transport Office, Begusarai, Bihar

description: The BR-10 Regional Transport Office serves the Bhagalpur district in Bihar, widely known as the 'Silk City'. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the collection of road taxes across the district jurisdiction.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Adampur, Bhagalpur, Bihar

description: The BR-11 RTO serves the Purnia district in Bihar, managing vehicle registration, driving licenses, and permit issuance. It plays a significant role in the transport infrastructure of the Purnia division and the Seemanchal region.
address: District Transport Office, Maranga Road, Mariam Nagar, Purnia, Bihar

description: The BR-19 RTO office serves the Saharsa district in the Kosi division of Bihar, managing all motor vehicle-related administrative tasks. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the enforcement of road safety regulations across the district. The office plays a critical role in the transportation infrastructure of North Bihar.
address: District Transport Office, Police Line, Saharsa, Bihar

description: BR-21 is the District Transport Office for Nalanda, headquartered in the historic city of Bihar Sharif. The office serves as a critical hub for vehicle registration and licensing in a region renowned for its educational heritage and proximity to the ancient Nalanda University. It manages transport regulation across 20 blocks, ensuring compliance with the Motor Vehicles Act within this significant administrative and cultural district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Campus, Bihar Sharif, Nalanda, Bihar

description: The BR-22 RTO is the primary transport authority for the Bettiah region in the West Champaran district of Bihar. It handles various transport-related services including vehicle registration, driving licenses, and the collection of road taxes for the district.
address: District Transport Office, Kamalnath Nagar, Bettiah, Bihar

description: The BR-24 RTO serves the Dehri-on-Sone subdivision within the Rohtas district of Bihar. It is responsible for essential transport services including vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and road tax collection for the southern region of the district.
address: District Transport Office, Dehri-on-Sone, Rohtas, Bihar

description: BR-25 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Jehanabad, Bihar. It provides essential services such as vehicle registration, fitness certificates, and driving license management for the Jehanabad district under the Magadh administrative division.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Campus, Jehanabad, Bihar

description: The BR-26 RTO serves the Aurangabad district in Bihar, operating under the Magadh Division. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport law enforcement across the district's administrative blocks.
address: District Transport Office, Collectoriate Campus, Aurangabad, Bihar

description: The BR-27 RTO is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Nawada, Bihar. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the enforcement of transport regulations within the Nawada district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Nawada, Bihar

description: The BR-28 Regional Transport Office serves the Gopalganj district in Bihar, operating under the Saran Division transport authority. This office is responsible for the registration of private and commercial vehicles, issuance of driving licenses, and enforcement of road safety regulations across the district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Gopalganj, Bihar

description: The BR-29 RTO serves the Siwan district in Bihar, functioning as the District Transport Office responsible for motor vehicle regulation. It handles driving licenses, vehicle registrations, and the enforcement of transport laws across the district's various sub-divisions.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Siwan, Bihar

description: The BR-30 RTO serves the Sitamarhi district in Bihar, headquartered in the administrative town of Dumra. It is responsible for motor vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and enforcement of transport regulations across the district's Indo-Nepal border region. The office operates under the Tirhut Division, playing a crucial role in road safety and revenue collection through various transport-related services.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Dumra Road, Sitamarhi, Bihar

description: BR-31 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for the Vaishali district, headquartered in Hajipur, Bihar. It serves as a vital transport node in North Bihar, managing high volumes of traffic crossing the Mahatma Gandhi Setu from the capital, Patna. The office oversees vehicle registration, driving permit issuance, and the enforcement of motor vehicle laws for the district's significant commercial and agricultural sectors.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Yadav Colony Road, Hajipur, Vaishali, Bihar

description: BR-32 is the District Transport Office for Madhubani, situated in the Mithila region of Bihar. The office oversees vehicle registration, licensing, and road safety enforcement for a district famous for its globally recognized Madhubani art and strategic location near the Indo-Nepal border. It serves as a critical transport node within the Darbhanga division, facilitating movement across both rural and urban sectors including major hubs like Jainagar and Jhanjharpur.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Madhubani, Bihar

description: The Samastipur District Transport Office (BR-33) is the primary transport authority for the Samastipur district in Bihar, falling under the Darbhanga administrative division. Known as the Heart of North Bihar, this RTO manages one of the state's busiest jurisdictions due to the city's status as a major railway hub and agricultural powerhouse. The office is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, road tax collection, and the enforcement of motor vehicle laws across 20 administrative blocks.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Uttarayan, Kasipur, Samastipur, Bihar

description: The BR-34 Regional Transport Office serves the Khagaria district in Bihar, located at the confluence of several major rivers including the Ganga and Gandak. This office is responsible for vehicle registration, licensing, and road safety enforcement in an area heavily reliant on agriculture and transport logistics. It facilitates essential services for the seven blocks of the district, playing a vital role in the transport infrastructure of the Munger Division.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, DTO Road, Ward No. 15, Khagaria, Bihar

description: The BR-37 Regional Transport Office serves the Kishanganj district in Bihar, located at the state's eastern border. It is responsible for motor vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and enforcement of transport regulations within its jurisdiction.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Kishanganj, Bihar

description: BR-38 is the official RTO code for the District Transport Office (DTO) in Araria, Bihar. This office is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the enforcement of transport regulations across the Araria district in the Purnia division.
address: District Transport Office, Kharahiya Basti, Araria, Bihar

description: The BR-39 Regional Transport Office (DTO) serves the Katihar district in Bihar. It is responsible for the administration of vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and enforcement of transport regulations and road safety standards within its jurisdiction.
address: District Transport Office, Mirchaibari, Katihar, Bihar

description: BR-43 is the Regional Transport Office (RTO) serving the Madhepura district in Bihar. It operates under the state's transport department to manage vehicle registrations, license issuances, and transport tax collections within the Kosi division.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Campus, Madhepura, Bihar
